page.title: 17Introduction-Longnor Sports
page.content:
Longnor Sports is an annual event held on a Thursday in September. It is a local tradition and has been going for 75 years.
All the people in the area gather together and enjoy themselves. Everyone goes at some point in the day so it is very well known. It starts at about 10 o'clock and finishes at about 4o'clock.
The large tents are put up a day or two before the event. One of the tents is for a bar. There is a hot-dog stall and many firms have exhibitions of their farming equipment, such as mowers, bailers, and sheep pens, electric fences and sheep dips. There are also stalls selling all kinds of equipment for horses. Sometimes there is a fair.
